PACC::SVG::PointList

PACC::SVG::PointList Class Reference
[Types]

List of points.This class is a standard vector of point (std::vector<Point>) with some utility functions and + and += operators to facilitate the concatenation of point lists. More...

Detailed Description

List of points.

This class is a standard vector of point (std::vector<Point>) with some utility functions and + and += operators to facilitate the concatenation of point lists.
